vote.title: Re-appointment of Matt Erickson MPA, with the City of Columbus 90 West Broad Street, Columbus, OH 43215, to continue serving on the RiverSouth Development Authority Board of Directors, with a new term expiration date of June 22, 2024, (resume attached).
